plugin-data.name: TD Countdown
plugin-data.description: Countdown plugin with custom date and time setting, header text and HTML formatted message display

sidebar-hint: Displays the Countdown on the sidebar
show-on-pages-hint: Displaying the Countdown on the specified pages
select-a-page-hint: Select the page where you want the Countdown plugin to display
position-in-content-hint: Display the Countdown in the content in the selected position.
content-alignment-hint: Here you can set the alignment of the Countdown text content (heading and text message only)
heading-text-size-hint:
This is the size of the heading text. The default is the size that is applied to plain text throughout the site.
Medium: default x2, big: default x3, large: default x4
heding-text-hint: Here you can give a short heading text whats will append before the counter
text-message-hint: This short message will be displayed below the counter. HTML formatting allowed.
date-time-settings-hint: The date format is YYYY/MM/DD eg. 2032/12/24. Based on this, the Countdown will appear.
